channel.title: About on The Lybry
channel.description: Recent content in About on The Lybry

item.title: Why the name ?
item.description: Booklordofthedings A unique name isnt it ? But how did it come that way ? Well the word Book was in there since the beginning. My first online representation was made by me together with my parents and I didnt really just wanted to use my full name, but rather I wanted to use something interesting. And as my main hobby during that time was reading and I wanted something that was cool (english words where cool at the time) so I used Book and my Firstname.

item.title: Awesome people
item.description: Why even make this ? As I have written in the description, these people are awesome and I really want to help and support them. One way to do so is to show of their stuff and link them here so you can check them out if you like. Impareon They/Them Their pfp and snowfox oc They are a great artist and also the person I commisioned my current pfp from.

item.title: All of the Links
item.description: “Let the links commence” But seriously this is the page where everything is linked The Lybry: The website you are on right now, a Hub for all of my shenanigans. Like a blog and a gallery. Twitter: My probably most commonly used social media rn. Tweets about everything. Youtube: I usually do streams here or more analytical stuff. Github: The place where I store all of my projects and also this website is hosted.

item.title: About me
item.description: So, about me. Im a 18 year old student living in germany People usually refer to me as “Booklordofthedings” or “Book” (he/him) I am very interested in alot of computer science topics and “know” how to program in C#, node js and in Beeflang There are alot of games and franchises I like, although I dont usually interact with the fandom. Most of them tend to be indie games, although I also like stuff like Plants vs Zombies, Paladins or Pokemon Since I call myself “Book"lordofthedings it would be weird if I wouldnt read.
